text: Der Prozess or Der Prozeß (German for "The Trial") may refer to: * The Trial (German: Der Process and variants), a novel by Franz Kafka first published in 1925 * Der Prozeß (opera), of 1953 by Gottfried von Einem, based on the Kafka novel * The Trial (1948 film) (German: Der Prozeß), a 1948 Austrian drama film ==See also== * Der Prozeß wird vertagt, an East German film released in 1958 * :de:Prozess (Begriffsklärung), a disambiguation page in German Wikipedia with additional topics
title: Der Prozess
